item.title: ADT
item.description: score:18 Chances: ADT has seen solid earnings estimate revision activity over the past month Streamlined focus on innovation and growth in core consumer markets Improved capital efficiency with revenue payback of 2.1 years Risks: The company is undergoing a secondary public offering which may dilute shareholder value The looming threat of a recession could affect consumer spending on security and automation products Score:18 chances characters count - risks characters count = 18

item.title: PAA
item.description: score:14 Chances: Plains All American Pipeline, L.P. beats earnings expectations with reported EPS of $0.4451, compared to expectations of $0.37. Plains All American Pipeline, L.P. and Plains GP Holdings LP combined Earnings Call indicates positive outlook for future growth in crude production in the Permian basin.
